meanings: Verb To reduce one's angry or upset feelings and rest easy.

vlive.korean: 맞아, 이렇게 해도 돌리는 거 맞죠 - 아니면 뭐 이렇게 돌려봐야 되나요? Yes it is. - Or like this? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 뉴이스트의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.5
vlive.english: Yes it is. - Or like this?

examples.korean: They learnt to right a capsized canoe. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 뒤집힌 카누를 바로 돌리는 법을 배웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They learnt to right a capsized canoe. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Start by dealing out ten cards to each player. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 게임할 사람 각각에게 카드를 열 장씩 돌리는 것으로 시작해. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Start by dealing out ten cards to each player. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: High prices in the UK make it worthwhile for buyers to look abroad. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 영국 내의 고물가 때문에 구매자들이 해외로 눈을 돌리는 것이 가치 있는 일이 되고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: High prices in the UK make it worthwhile for buyers to look abroad. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His habit is to take a mouthful of water and swirl it around in his mouth after meals. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 습관은 식사 후 물을 한 모금 물고 입 안에서 빙빙 돌리는 것이다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: His habit is to take a mouthful of water and swirl it around in his mouth after meals. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I tend to think that blaming the failure of the product launch on R&D may be a mistake. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저는 제품 출시 실패를 R&D 탓으로 돌리는 것이 잘못일지도 모른다고 생각하는 편입니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I tend to think that blaming the failure of the product launch on R&D may be a mistake. Add to Wordbook
